repository.name: yolov3
repository.description: YOLOv3 in PyTorch > ONNX > CoreML > TFLite

issue.title: Low confidence and something about conf_thres

repository.name: yolov3
repository.description: YOLOv3 in PyTorch > ONNX > CoreML > TFLite

issue.body:
I'm training my own dataset for one class, and seems to get a good reported result after only 40 epochs. The printed imformation during train phase is:
```
              Class    Images   Targets         P         R       mAP        F1
                 all  2.40e+03   6.9e+03     0.893     0.863      0.84     0.878
```
However, with default arguments, the results of test.py don't looks this good, and detect.py only show a littile detections.

I noticed that this phenomenon may be caused by different conf-thres configment in the three codes, which is 0.1 in train.py, 0.001 in test.py, 0.5 in detect.py.

This different may cause:
- Good performance shown in train.py
- Lower P in test.py than train.py
- Lower R in detect.py than train.py

Besides, I also noticed that inference of my model has low confidence, what can I do to improve this? Is simply resume training this model okay? Or I should modify the loss hyps?

BTW, I also also noticed that the 1st batch in either train phase or detect phase costs far more time than others, is this regular?

issue.title: Precision in test.py and train.py is not consistent;  Cache_images uses more space with fewer images

repository.name: yolov3
repository.description: YOLOv3 in PyTorch > ONNX > CoreML > TFLite

issue.body:
The precision of all classes when running train.py is 0.8xx(first photo), but the precision of all classes when running test.py is 0.09xx(second photo). I don't understand.
Another question is when caching images, 655 images use 0.2GB and 130 images use 6.5GB(first photo). Is this a bug or any other problem?
![train](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58249279/71340469-e9219800-2591-11ea-95d4-55992343fe9b.PNG)
![test](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58249279/71340471-eaeb5b80-2591-11ea-9ac6-87d853477f9f.PNG)

issue.title: Some question,please author help me resolve.

issue.body:
1.The GIoU's range is [-1,1],why the result is not in there?
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22149823/71570782-f1d61900-2b11-11ea-83fa-3e6902937024.png)
2.What's the mean of Objectness?Is it the same as Confidence?
3.I train my dataset, one class.The Classification curve is empty?The result is zero.
4.When finish the train,there are some weights,which one should i use?Best.pt? Or Last.pt?Or other?
